name: Pong Remake (UnfortunateUroboros)
description: During my first week of game development, I am going to create a simple rendition of the historic game: Pong. This remake will aim to better my understanding of Unity as well as creating a game development workflow that works for me. I hope you enjoy my simple game as I only intend to spend a week in development before moving on to my next project. Some assets have been borrowed for a tutorial or two, but I intend to replace all graphics as art becomes available (in case you're interested).
